amendment.description: Amendment sought to state FERC may not issue a certificate of crossing if any part of the oil or natural gas pipeline project is to be located on lands required under Federal, State, or local law to be managed for purposes of natural resource conservation or recreation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 115-235 to state FERC may not issue a certificate of crossing if any part of the oil or natural gas pipeline project is to be located on lands required under Federal, State, or local law to be managed for purposes of natural resource conservation or recreation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tsongas amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 247 (Roll no. 396).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tsongas amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 247 (Roll no. 396).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Tsongas.
